PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-05432022-05-19,  ,  TBS,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Auditors of the wholly-owned subsidiaries of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board
PrecisOrder appointing (1) an AUDITOR for each of the WHOLLY-OWNED SUBSIDIARIES of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION BOARD for the fiscal year that ends during the period beginning on January 1, 2021 and ending on March 31, 2022; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR for each of the WHOLLY-OWNED SUBSIDIARIES of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION BOARD for the fiscal year that ends during the period beginning on January 1, 2021 and ending on March 31, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
